item.title: User-Friendly Pattern Recognition
item.description: Currently, I’m working on an interesting project that started as an internal university internship. Basically, it can be described as pattern recognition as a service. I was very happy with the project task because even if I’m new to machine learning I’m very interested in it. I also like to build user-friendly applications and play around with some visualizations. So I decided to do it. Background Before we go further, here are some definitions to be sure we have the same ideas in mind.
